text:
Bhai KG, sabse gajab yaad teri hai mereko jab tujhe raat 12 baje call aaya achanak se aur tune dheere se bola ’thank you’. Tera birthday nhi tha. Lekin hamare desh ke kaafi kaabil honehaar future engineers aviral mohit ne dimaag lagaya saala kuch to hai. Bc tera hindi calender ka birthday tha. Faaltu mein gpl hui teri. Aur tujhe canteen mein khilana pada wo bhi bina baithe. But kasam se door se jitna seedha lagta hai utna hi tedha hai. Kisi ke maje lene ho ya prank karna ho to sabse aage. Khair bhai first year mein mm to khela hai hamne aur bulla bhi bahut kaata hai. Orientation mein apan dono ne hi haath khada kiya tha jab poocha tha baapu branch change ka ne aur saale tune karke dikhaya. 
Chill maariyo life mein, tune rocky se constant panga liya hai tujhe ab kisi se darne ki jaroorat nhi. Jahan jaoge phod doge. Like literally. No jk. 
Wish you best. God bless.
author: Sarthak  Solanki

text:
Bhai aaj FIFA?? 

Soni ne sahi kiya tha tereko ko 2nd yr mein roommate banake. It was a start of great friendship and had a lot fun in 5 bot. phir bc pata nhi kyun tu apne saath nhi aaya 3rd yr mein but tab bhi yaari rhi. You were my friend in need friend indeed during placements. kasam se haar maan hi li thi maine.
God bless. Wish you best.
author: Sarthak  Solanki

text:
Dear Rakshit,
Shuruat i love you se kardeta lekin socha chhodo kyun hi faltu mein soch mein daalna. Bhai tere bina degree hi nhi nikalti. You were always my fire brigade in the campus. Acads mein problem ho ya life mein ya koi discussion karna ho kisi bhi topic pe kitna bhi intellectual you were always there. Like aham brahmasmi. 
Canteen mein ya room mein kitna bulla kaata hai wo bhi saala exam tym pe, projects/assignments kiye (karwaaye tune) saath mein, 3rd year door chala gaya tha kasam se dukh hua but tab bhi yaari bani rahi. Aage angreji mein - 
You are one of the most open minded, forward looking and resourceful guy I ever met. You have consistently shown the dridh nishchay to recover from toughest defeats to reach the ultimate success. Wish you best. God bless. I hope you find someone who can give you the happiness I couldnd. ~nibbi wala meme
author: Sarthak  Solanki

text: The sweet and charming guy whenever I talked to was always happy and smiling. Pandit, I am pretty sure you are the economist India needs. Wish you very best for the future.
author: Sarthak  Solanki
